Name: Grilled Cheese
Notes: Sandwich is good but could use some more cheese.
Steps:
Group: 1
* Chop fresh parsley

Group: 2
* Add galic
* Add oregano

Group: 3
* Wash and cut spinach

Heat skillet to medium high.
Add butter and sliced bread.
Toast on one side.

Once the bread is toasted.
Remove from skillet and add a little more butter then put untoasted side down.
Put cheese and spices attop the toasted bread.
Close sandwich and grill until finished.
